item.cataclysm.infernal_forge.desc: §7§oRight Click on a block to cause AOE damage
item.cataclysm.gauntlet_of_guard.desc: §7§oRight Click to pull entities towards you!
item.cataclysm.monstrous_helm.desc: §7§oFalling below half health knocks back nearby entities
item.cataclysm.monstrous_helm2.desc: §7§oand increases Defense, Knockback Resistance and Regeneration!
item.cataclysm.cursium_helmet.desc2: §7§oPress %s to give a glow effect to entities behind walls!
item.cataclysm.cursium_chestplate.desc2: §7§oRevive to 5 health upon dying and granted invincibility for 5 seconds!
item.cataclysm.cursium_chestplate.desc3: §7§oAfter reviving, The Player cannot revive for 6 Minutes!
item.cataclysm.cursium_leggings.desc2: §7§oSmall chance to evade an attack. The probability increases if the attack is a projectile
item.cataclysm.cursium_boots.desc2: §7§oReduce fall damage, Press %s to back step
item.cataclysm.bulwark_of_the_flame.desc: §7§oRelease while sneaking to charge forward and damage entities!
item.cataclysm.bulwark_of_the_flame2.des: §7§oIf the target hits a wall, it will receive extra damage and be temporarily stunned!
item.cataclysm.cursed_bow2.desc: §7§oWhile using Spectral Arrows two shots will be fired.
item.cataclysm.annihilator2.desc: While holding in both hands, it can be charged it for AOE damage!
item.cataclysm.soul_render2.desc: §7§oWhen used while sneaking, summon §dPhantom Halberds§r§o§7§o in a spiral pattern!
item.cataclysm.void_forge.desc: §7§oRight click at a block to summon Void Runes
item.cataclysm.incinerator2.desc: §7§oHold Right Click to summon a §r§dFlame Strike§r§7§o in the direction you are facing!
item.cataclysm.incinerator3.desc: §8§oDropped items may be lost when the flame strike explodes..
item.cataclysm.wither_assault_shoulder_w: §7§oWhile sneaking, right click to shoot Wither Howitzers.
item.cataclysm.gauntlet_of_bulwark.desc: §7§oHold right click push nearby entities and inflict §eBlazing Brand
item.cataclysm.gauntlet_of_bulwark.desc2: §7§oRelease to charge forward and damage entities!
item.cataclysm.tidal_claws.desc: §7§oRight click to fire a grappling hook
item.cataclysm.tidal_claws.desc2: §7§oLeft click to shoot a tentacle that damages entities
item.cataclysm.bloom_stone_pauldrons.des: §7§oPress the %s §7§oKey to fire amethyst clusters around you that damage entities.
item.cataclysm.blessed_amethyst_crab_mea: §7§oBe granted the Blessing Effect. Become immune to darkness, abyssal fear and abyssal burn!
item.cataclysm.laser_gatling.desc: §7§oReload with the Redstone in your inventory
item.cataclysm.blazing_grips.desc: §7§oOn hit, there is a chance to apply Blazing Brand to the target
item.cataclysm.immolator.desc: §7§oCritical damage to targets afflicted with Blazing Brand
item.cataclysm.immolator2.desc: §7§oAfter charging for 2 seconds for summon Flame strike
entity.cataclysm.the_leviathan_immune: §7§oThe Leviathan is invincible outside of water!
item.cataclysm.remnant_skull.desc: §7§oSummon Modern Remnant, can be tamed through Sniffer Egg
item.cataclysm.netherite_effigy.desc: §7§oSummon Netherite Ministrosity, can be tamed through Lava Power Cell
item.cataclysm.gauntlet_of_maelstrom.des: §7§oRight click to summon a Void Vortex
advancements.cataclysm.kill_ignis.title: The Extinguished Flame
advancements.cataclysm.kill_remnant.desc: Excavate the suspicious sand within the cursed pyramid to wake up and knock down the Ancient Remnant
